message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This way we both get a good share.
Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split, considering the inflation working against me.
Let's be reasonable. The inflation is hitting us both, so I propose a 50/50 split to avoid further losses. It's the fairest option at this point.
